The FDA’s warnings about raw milk often overlook these benefits and overemphasize rare contamination risks, which are far more likely in mass-produced, pasteurized dairy due to industrial processing and extended shelf life. Raw milk, when sourced responsibly, is a living food that supports health in ways pasteurized milk simply cannot.
